sense.def:
A form of something
je vrsta nečesa.

seg.quote: He begged for any form of transport that would take him to the ferry.
...money in the form of notes or cheques.
The broadcast took the form of an interview.

sense.def:
Kadar osebe ali predmeti
form a particular shape
, se premikajo ali so postavljeni tako, da nastane določena oblika.

The form of something
je oblika nečesa.

seg.quote: The middle finger was touching the end of the thumb in the form of a letter O.
She gazed with deep affection at his slumbering form.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
forms a thing with a particular structure or function
, ima določeno zgradbo ali vlogo.

seg.quote: The chair folds back to form a couch.
...red rocks forming a kind of cave.

sense.def:
Kadar stvari ali ljudje
form a particular thing
, so oni tisto, iz česar je nekaj sestavljeno.

seg.quote: The contents of the house will form the basis of a major exhibition.

sense.def:
To form an organization, group, or company
pomeni začeti neko organizacijo, skupino ali podjetje.

Kadar nekaj
forms
ali
is formed
, začne obstajati.

seg.quote: The islands are volcanic and were formed comparatively recently.
He formed the habit of taking long solitary walks.

sense.def:
A form
je list papirja, na katerem so vprašanja. Odgovore napišemo na isti list papirja.

V šoli je
a form
razred ali vsi razredi z otroki približno enake starosti.

To be on form
pomeni zelo dobro izvajati svojo običajno dejavnost.
To be off form
pomeni ne delati tako dobro kot ponavadi.

Kadar je vedenje nekega človeka
true to form
, je značilno zanj.

seg.quote: Watson, true to form, made an instant decision.
